title: 1.14版本怎么自定义刷怪笼怪物的装备
author: ⑨十二
txt_content:
/setblock ~ ~1 ~ spawner
{SpawnCount:4,SpawnRange:4,RequiredPlayerRange:16,Delay:0,MinSpawnDelay:200,MaxSpawnDelay:800,MaxNearbyEntities:6,
SpawnData:{Equipment:[{id: diamond_sword ,Count:1,}]},
DropChances:[1.0F],
SpawnPotentials: [{Entity: {id: "minecraft:zombie"}, Weight: 1}]}


我把钻石剑的不同ID都尝试了一遍，minecraft:diamond_sword，钻石剑数字ID，带引号的也试了，甚至还试了带空格的，然而刷的僵尸都是空手

replies.author: хmdhs

好乱。。试试我这个

/setblock ~ ~ ~ minecraft:spawner{SpawnPotentials:[{Entity:{id:"minecraft:zombie ...
大佬帮个忙，能不能让僵尸穿上钻石套？
